channel.title: Can't get a source to start
channel.description:
Hey what's up everyone,
I've just downloaded the Hybrid PvP source and client to try to start coding a bit. However when I open it I can't seem to get to even play on it. I was hoping someone could explain it to me because I THINK I need to make like my own server before using the Source? I don't know any help would be highly appriciated, because once I can get on it I'll just watch little tutorials per piece i'm going to code ;).
Thanks allready.

item.title: Can't get a source to start
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

[quote=“legend50, post:6, topic:393728”][quote author=UniqueTrys link=topic=490913.msg3589683#msg3589683 date=1304488868]
I’m going to try this you have Skype? Would be great atleast if you have some spare time to help me :).
[/quote]
nope i dont have skype btw wat kind of server r u making 317 ? 508?[/quote]

I think its like a 317 with 597 items and NPCs something like that. You have MSN anything that makes the talking easyer than this is fine with me :p.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't get a source to start
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

I’m going to try this you have Skype? Would be great atleast if you have some spare time to help me :).

I tryd it but I don’t have these things in the maps for some reason. I had another source one time and I did have it and it just instantly worked but that one wasn’t that good and this one is amazing.

Add me on skype please ‘pvm-unique’

item.source: Can't get a source to start

item.title: Can't get a source to start
item.dc:creator: @legend50 legend50
item.description:
@legend50 wrote:

[quote=“UniqueTrys, post:3, topic:393728”]And how do I do all that and what do I actually change it to? I’m really new, could you maybe detail it a little more?

Thank you :).[/quote]
u go to ur C:\Program Files\Java there should be a folder that say jdk and the version u have if u dont download it from java.com i recommend jdk1.6.0_21 after u download it open ur source folder find ur compile and ur run.bat then all u do is edit it once u open the edit of the file u will c that it say jdk1.6.0_ <-- and the number will be different it or the same if it different change it to the 1 u have i hope u understand what i mean if not i can find a tutorial for u on youtube

Read full topic

I’ve just downloaded the Hybrid PvP source and client to try to start coding a bit. However when I open it I can’t seem to get to even play on it. if u get get ur source to work open ur server which is the source folder find the run.bat for server and edit it change it to the jdk u have n also change the compile to the same jdk u have then after u finish editing compile n then run the server
